about_the_game:
When asked what spices up their lives, pedestrians, drivers, and passengers usually agree: variety!

Make your passengers feel like they are on a haunted bus with this "Halloween" themed bus interior pack, including specifically designed seats and floor patterns.
Customize your bus and make it your own. Enjoy the freedom of choice and try something new.

The next scary shift is about to begin! So, what are you waiting for? Get in, sit down, and enjoy the eerily beautiful interior designs of your buses!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2120 / AMD Phenom II X4 830 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 (2GB VRAM) / AMD Radeon R9 280 (2GB VRAM) or higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4440 / AMD FC-8140z or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 (8GB VRAM) / AMD Radeon RX Vega 56 (8GB VRAM) or higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
